actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to develop and implement strategies for research and development for bioindustrial manufacturing and the implementation of additive manufacturing for defense purposes, and for other purposes.
short_title: Bioindustrial and Additive Manufacturing for America Act of 2022

summary.text:
Bioindustrial and Additive Manufacturing for America Act of 2022

This bill requires the Department of Defense (DOD) to transmit to the Joint Defense Manufacturing Council (1) a research, development, and implementation strategy for bioindustrial manufacturing; and (2) a strategy for additive manufacturing. DOD must also submit a copy of such strategies to Congress.

titles.title: Bioindustrial and Additive Manufacturing for America Act of 2022
